摬字的基本解释

摬
yǐng
击中（zh恘g ）。

摬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǐng］
［《廣韻》於丙切，上梗，影。］
击中，击伤。

摬字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　摬； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页451第09
【唐韻】一敬切【集韻】於慶切，?音映。【說文】中擊也。　又【唐韻】於丙切【集韻】於境切，?音影。【博雅】擊也。　又【集韻】倚兩切，音怏。又巨兩切，强上聲。義?同。

摬字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
摬字的起名意思

暂无。

摬
Basic explanation of words
摬
yǐng
Hit (zh恘g).
摬
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǐng］
["Guangyun" Yu Bingqie, top stem, shadow. ]
Hit, hurt.
摬
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hands and Words Department] 　摬; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 451 09
【Tang Yun】Yi Jingqie 【Ji Yun】Yu Qingqie, with sound and shadow. [Said the text] Hit also.　[Tang Yun] Yu Bingqie [Jiyun] Yu Jingqie, audio and video. [Bo Ya] Hit also.　[Jiyun] Leaning on two cuts, the sound is unbelievable. Make another big cut, strong voice. Righteous? Same.
